question: Which of the following led the army of the East India Company in the battle of Buxar which took place in 1764?
explanation: The army of the East India Company was led by Hector Munro in the battle of Buxar in 1764. The combined armies of Mir Kasim, the Nawab of Awadh and Shah Alam II (Mughal emperor) were defeated by the English forces under Major Hector Munro at Buxar.
